question: The Election Commission of which country is to take over the Chair of the Forum of the Election Management Bodies of South Asia (FEMBoSA) in 2020?
explanation:
Election Commission of India (ECI) will take over the Chair of the Forum of the Election Management Bodies of South Asia (FEMBoSA), for the year 2020.
ECI hosted the 10th Annual Meeting of the FEMBoSA forum in New Delhi recently. During the Annual meeting, an International Conference was also organised on the theme ‘Strengthening Institutional Capacity’. ECI is also set to renew the Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) for cooperation in the field of election management with the Election Commission of Afghanistan. The forum was established in 2012 with an aim of sharing experiences of the Election commissions and experts.
